name: Age Of Time
description:
In an effort to bend time to their will and needs, an alien race attempted what many others have tried to do, but like all others before them, time continues to bend to no will but it's own.

They thought they had succeeded this time, but alas the machine they made has now spun out of control. Stuck in a state of overdrive, everything around it has also started to advance in time faster than it should. With it's reach slowly spreading and the clock ticking faster; there's only one way to shut it down.

One final race to the top; however your only opponent is the very thing you sought to control; time.

Amrit

Kranox

KE-REM

TheCatLady

Blazen
